title: Take A Power Walk With Nina Tandon, Who Followed Her Passion To A Groundbreaking Career
title_page: Take A Power Walk With Nina Tandon, Who Followed Her Passion To A Groundbreaking Career
text:
The idea of following your passion may sometimes feel easier said than done, and CEO and co-founder of EpiBone Nina Tandon understands that better than anyone. "You know, I get it. 'Follow your passion'— it can sound so impractical when there are so many good reasons not to," she tells Bustle during a walk through New York's Fort Tryon Park.
But as she discusses in the video below, Tandon has proven that following her lifelong passion for science and biology turned out to be the secret ingredient behind her successful career.
To inspire women to pursue their passions through their careers, no matter what the journey may look like, Bustle caught up with Tandon in the fourth episode of Power Walk. Hosted by Kéla Walker, Power Walk is a series created in partnership with JPMorgan Chase that showcases and highlights women who are finding success in their own way. In the fourth episode of Power Walk, Tandon inspires women to turn their passions into their careers.
